original_text: They must not eat the seeds of grapes for all the time that they are Nazirites. They must not even eat the skins of grapes.
korean_text: 자기 몸을 구별하는 모든 날 동안에는 포도나무 소산은 씨나 껍질이라도 먹지 말지며

sentences.original_text: They must not eat the seeds of grapes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 포도 씨를 먹어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: for all the time that they are Nazirites
They must not even eat the skins of grapes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 포도 껍질조차도 먹어서는 안 됩니다
